function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal settlements devoid of governance, design, services, and legal status","Impact":"Difficulty in managing infection, treatment, social distancing, and service provision","Mitigation":"Improving governance, providing design and services, legalizing the settlements","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, sanitation infrastructure, digital services","People":"People living in informal settlements","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners"},{"Description":"Inequalities in access to sanitation and homelessness","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and difficulty in managing pandemics","Mitigation":"Improving access to sanitation, addressing homelessness, reducing inequalities","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, affordable housing solutions, social welfare programs","People":"People with poor access to sanitation and homeless individuals","Owner":"Government authorities, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges in managing high-rise-dense cities during pandemics","Impact":"Difficulty in managing crowded spaces and ensuring social distancing","Mitigation":"Implementing crowd management strategies, enhancing testing facilities, utilizing digital trackers","Technologies":"Crowd management tools, testing facilities, digital tracking systems","People":"Residents of high-rise-dense cities","Owner":"City authorities, urban planners"}]}
